quickSetup.contentModelHint: コード分析を含む実際のドキュメントコンテンツを生成します。最高品質のために最も高性能なモデルを使用してください。
quickSetup.translationModelHint: 生成されたドキュメントを他の言語に翻訳します。高速で低コストなモデルで十分です。

githubImport.title: GitHub Import
githubImport.description: Import repositories from GitHub organizations via GitHub App integration
githubImport.notConfigured: GitHub App is not configured. Set GITHUB_APP_ID and GITHUB_APP_PRIVATE_KEY environment variables.
githubImport.configured: GitHub App is configured and ready
githubImport.searchPlaceholder: Search repositories by name or description...
githubImport.step1: Create a GitHub App in your GitHub organization settings
githubImport.step2: Set the callback URL to your DeepWiki admin URL + /admin/github-import/callback
githubImport.step3: Configure GITHUB_APP_ID and GITHUB_APP_PRIVATE_KEY (base64-encoded PEM) in the backend environment
githubImport.step4: Click 'Connect New Organization' to install the app on your organization
githubImport.configDescription: Configure your GitHub App credentials to enable private repository import. Credentials are validated against the GitHub API before saving.
githubImport.appIdHelp: Find this in your GitHub App settings page under 'About' > 'App ID'
githubImport.appNameHelp: The URL-friendly slug of your GitHub App (from the URL: github.com/apps/{name})
githubImport.privateKeyPlaceholder:
-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
...
-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
githubImport.privateKeyHelp: Paste the contents of the .pem file, or use the 'Load .pem file' button above
githubImport.configSaved: GitHub App credentials saved and verified successfully
githubImport.overrideEnvWarning: Saving here will override the environment variable configuration.
githubImport.createAppLink: Learn how to create a GitHub App
githubImport.updateConfigDescription: Modify your GitHub App credentials. The private key field is empty because it is not returned for security reasons -- only fill it in if you want to change it.
githubImport.privateKeyUpdateHelp: Leave empty to keep the existing private key. Only fill in if you want to replace it.
githubImport.validationPrivateKeyInvalid: Private Key must be a valid PEM file (should start with '-----BEGIN')
githubImport.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect {org}? This will remove the organization connection but will not uninstall the GitHub App.
githubImport.resetConfigConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset the GitHub App configuration? This will remove all stored credentials. You will need to reconfigure the GitHub App to use this feature again.
githubImport.resetConfigSuccess: GitHub App configuration has been reset
